title: Contains search is slow
content:
The agent portal is slow when you're performing a Contains search in grids, reports, dropdown lists, or business rules. For example, a Contains search doesn't return the search results within 5 seconds. 

Cause

A fast Contains search requires valid trigram indexes to exist in the xservices_ems database in your environment. If not, a Contains search might be slow or even time out.

Solution

Check the xservices_ems database to see if the required trigram indexes exist. If not, manually create them. For details, see Check trigram indexes for the Contains search.
